video_prompt: A white-maned lion-human character's hands emit shimmering golden sparks, flowing upward and around the figure. Ethereal light pulses, illuminating intricate robes and casting shifting shadows on the dark background.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Vertical shot, majestic lion-headed human (white fur, pale blue/grey mane, amber eyes, pinkish-red nose, faint whiskers) in multi-layered white and silver embroidered robes, ornate belt. Hands extended, palms up, emitting golden magical sparks and light. Dark, textured background with magical bokeh. Dramatic lighting, ethereal atmosphere. Subtle "c29" in bottom right.
refined_video_prompt: Golden sparks shimmer and flow from the character's hands, swirling upwards and around the figure. Ethereal light pulses, dynamically illuminating robes and causing shifting shadows to dance across the dark background.
